misc.post: Actually, he stole that entire list from Toptenz.net. Thanks for mentioning it anyway. Can you remove the link to his site and place the link to the source site – http://www.toptenz.net/top-10-bizarre-archeological-discoveries.php – You can even see he left all the link to my site in the content when he swiped it.
misc.title: The Shroud of Turin is Number One on This List
